trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The brawny Loporrit wants to see how tough you really are.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the brawny Loporrit and defeat the mankind checker.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_000<tab>My, what impeccable timing. I was hoping you might stop by.

TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_001<tab>As you well know by now, these facilities were built to meet any and all needs your people might have. However, you're not at all what we expected, and I don't mean just your exceedingly diminutive stature. A great number of changes must be made, including to our sentry drones.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_002<tab>We have no frame of reference for what may pose a threat to your kind, and I believe a better understanding of your strength may enlighten us.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_003<tab>Not just your physical strength, mind, but your strategic prowess as well, which is why I'd like to see how you fare in a fight. What do you say?
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_004<tab>Wonderful! If you could meet me in Greatest Endsvale, I'll see that everything is ready when you get there.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_010<tab>Let's get started, shall we? Activating terminal one. Begin data acquisition!

TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_020<tab>You certainly have a knack for battle. I can hardly imagine how strong your enemies must be. All the more reason our sentries are in serious need of improvements. Now, might I trouble you for one more test?

TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_021<tab>That's the spirit! I can't imagine you'll have much trouble after seeing that first display, but one can never have too much data. Let's try one of our drones from terminal two.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_030<tab>That was incredible. You haven't been sneaking any iron carrots, have you? I had no idea your kind were so fearsome in battle.

TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_031<tab>Maybe we should forget the sentries and have you guard Bestways Burrow. I jest, I jest─we would never dream of putting you or your people in harm's way.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_032<tab>I want to thank you properly, but not here. Let's head back to the main plaza.
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_040<tab>The moon will be as safe as safe can be once the drones are refurbished, and thanks to you, I have all the data I could ask for.

TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_041<tab>Though I did read something a touch concerning in one of the books our collaborators sent us. Something about certain drinks you imbibe that make you a threat to yourselves and everyone around you...? I hope our drones will be prepared for such an emergency...
TEXT_AKTKZE008_04247_LOPORRITSA04247_000_042<tab>At any rate, I better get back to work. It's not much, but I'd like you to have this─a small token of thanks for your help.
